mapper.sql: id, patient_no, patient_name, patient_password, patient_salt, patient_sex, patient_birth, patient_phone, is_deleted, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: update patient set is_deleted = 1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
